{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Squirtbottle |image = [[File:Squirtbottle.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Squirtbottle''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Goldenrod City in Johto) |effect = Increases the chance of berry mutations }} The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of mutations occurring in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the Johto Berry Master in Goldenrod City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !!
